sections.heading: Building Administrator; bond or insurance
sections.text: The administrator shall, before entering upon the discharge of the duties of his office, be bonded or insured as required by section 11-201. The premium shall be paid by the state.SourceLaws 1974, LB 1048, ยง 5;Laws 1978, LB 653, ยง 34;Laws 2004, LB 884, ยง 43.
